title: Accessibility (Scoreboard) [IAB-2871]: Verify that for the "Free Game of the Day" that the Game Drawer will successfully read as "Matchup" followed by "Free Game of the Day" on an opened/closed Game Drawer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Accessibility Enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we tap on a Game Drawer that is a "Free Game of the Day"
custom_expected: THEN accessibility will read it as <Game is Read> followed by <Free Game of the Day>

title: Accessibility (MLB.TV) [IAB-4110]: Verify that if we are inside MLB.TV that the controls will not dismiss if the user has Accessibility enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have enabled Accessibility
custom_steps: WHEN we launch an MLB.TV Stream
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Media UI Controls will no longer dismiss if the user has Accessibility enabled

title: Accessibility (News) [IAB-4937]: The new MLB.com button the upper left needs a VoiceOver label
custom_preconds:
Given Voiceover has been activated
And the user has navigated to the News page
custom_steps: Then when the MLB.com button is tapped
custom_expected: Then Voiceover will recognize it as "New Filter Button, select news for a certain team"

title: Accessibility (MLB.TV) [IAB-4948]: Verify that if we tap on the "Pause" button inside an MLB.TV Stream/Archive that it reads as "Pause Button"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have enabled "Accessibility"
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Videos
AND we tap on the MLB.TV Tab
AND we start up an MLB.TV Stream
OR we start up an MLB.TV Archive Stream
AND we tap on the "Pause Button"
custom_expected: THEN the "Pause Button" will read as "Pause Button"

title: Audio [IAB-4975]: Empty log file is being attached when choosing "Contact Us"
custom_preconds:
Given an email account exists on the device
And the user has launched the app
And has accessed the Audio UI
But has not played backed audio/video through any access points in the app
custom_steps:
When the Help button is tapped
And the Contact Us button is tapped
And the "mlb-mobile-cs@mlb.com" link is tapped
custom_expected:
Then an email will be created containing device info will be created 
But will not contain an attached log file

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5027]: Verify that the Disconnect Button is always below the "Sync powered by Microsoft" logo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Ford Sync screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Disconnect" button will always appear below the "Sync powered by Microsoft" logo.

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5040]: Verify that the Head Unit will update appropriately every 2 minutes to display the latest Game Progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
AND there are games in progress
custom_steps: WHEN we have a game up on the Head Unit's display
custom_expected: THEN it will successfully update a games progress every 2 minutes

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5042]: Verify that when a game is in progress that it will be announced as: Team A vs. Team B <Inning Information>, Team A lead xx-yy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps:
WHEN we issue a Team Command
AND there is a game in progress for that particular team
custom_expected: THEN we will notice that the game is announced correctly as: Team A vs. Team B <Inning Information>, Team A lead xx-yy

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5043]: Verify that changing feeds will update the display on the Head Unit appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps: WHEN we issue a command to switch Audio Feeds
custom_expected: THEN the Head Unit display will update appropriately to reflect the new Audio Feed

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5048]: Verify that the Losing Team is never listed as the Winning Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps: WHEN we use the Team Command to bring up the score from a game gone final
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Winning Team is announced correctly
AND we will see that the Losing Team is announced correctly

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5095]: Verify that a game in a "Final" state reads as "Final" and not "Game Over"
custom_preconds: Given the game has gone into a Final state
custom_steps: When the game is displayed on the Ford Sync head unit
custom_expected:
Then there are no commas
And the word "Final" is displayed after the teams/score listing

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5095]: Verify that the screen text displays as "Team vs. Team" and not "Team vs. Team,"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps: WHEN we issue a Team Command
custom_expected:
THEN the display will display as "Team vs. Team"
AND the display will not display as "Team vs. Team,"

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5097]: Verify that when a feed has ended that it reads as "Final - Feed Ended" instead of "Final - Unknown Error"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps:
WHEN we issue a Team Command
AND the game for the Team in question has entered a Final state where the feed is no longer available
custom_expected: THEN we will see that it will read as "Final - Feed Ended"

title: Gameday: Summary Tab [IAB-4904]: Verify summary for games in a final state will default to the 1st inning
custom_preconds:
Given a game is in a Final state
And the user has navigated to Gameday
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Summary icon in the tab tray
custom_expected:
Then the Summary page will default to the Plays view
And will show "Top of 1st" at the top of the page

title: Gameday: Video Highlights [IAB-5088]: Verify that the bottom portion of each month name isn't cut off for a Video Highlight
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday for a game that is in the state of "In Progress"
OR we navigate to Gameday for a game that is in the state of "Final"
AND we tap on the "Video Highlights" tab
AND we see Video Highlights available
custom_expected: THEN we will see that on the Video Highlights that the bottom portion of the month isn't slightly cut off for each month of the year

title: Gameday [IAB-5104]: Verify that if Pitchers on the "Wrap" screen have double digit wins / losses that they stay within the borders correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate to a game that has moved to  a state of "Final"
AND this particular game in question has a pitcher with double digit wins
OR this particular game in question has a pitcher with double digit losses
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the pitching information stays inside the borders correctly

title: Hide Scores [IAB-4989]: Verify that if we toggle the "Hide Scores" banner on/off that when it displays there is an "x" that allows us to close the banner
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we enable "Hide Scores"
OR we disable "Hide Scores"
AND we see the banner appear
custom_expected: THEN the banner will have an "x" that allows us to close it

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5013]: Verify that we can see the "Innings" label still if "Hide Scores" is enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have enabled "Hide Scores"
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate around the application
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Innings" label is still present

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5044]: Verify that when "Hide Scores" is enabled and we are on the Scoreboard that we see a message of "Hide Scores ON" just below the "Date Picker"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have enabled "Hide Scores"
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to the "Scoreboard"
custom_expected: THEN just below the "Date Picker" we will see a message stating "Hide Scores ON"

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5053]: Verify that if we "Shake to Toggle" that if a previous "Hide Scores" banner was visible that it dismisses itself before the new banner comes in and doesn't blink out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have "Shake to Toggle" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we "Shake to Toggle"
AND we see the banner appear
AND we "Shake to Toggle"
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the old banner animate out
AND we will see the new banner animate in
AND we will not see the old banner just simply blink out

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5083]: Verify that the "Hide Scores" banner can't persist and portray the wrong state if the user switches between the Team / Scoreboard Tabs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat 
AND we have launched the Application 
AND we have "Shake to Toggle" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Scoreboard 
AND we "Shake to Toggle" 
AND we see the "Hide Scores On" banner appear 
AND we navigate to a Favorite Team 
AND we "Shake to Toggle" 
AND we see the "Hide Scores Off" banner appear / disappear 
AND we navigate back to Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the "Hide Scores On" banner will not be present on the Scoreboard tab
AND we will see that the "Hide Scores" is actually disabled

title: Paywall [IAB-4914]: iPhone MLB.TV PayWall image is inaccurate, it's showing the old TV overlays
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been recently installed
Or the app has been installed & and the user is a Lite user & and has attempted to access a feature not authorized for Lite users
custom_steps: When the Paywall appears on screen
custom_expected: Then user will see containing current overlays

title: Live Look In [IAB-4922]: Verify that the Live Look In button doesn't look distorted on iOS 6
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing an iOS 6 device
custom_steps: WHEN we receive a Live Look In
custom_expected: THEN the Live Look In banner will not be distorted

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4920]: Verify that the national blackout text reads correctly at the moment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Videos
AND we navigate to the MLB.TV tab
AND we start up a MLB.TV Stream that is nationally blacked out
custom_expected:
THEN the "National Blackout" text will read as:

"Blackout Restriction

It has been determined that you are blacked out of watching
the video you selected."

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4968]: Make MLBTV Free trial duration text configurable in the Paywall
custom_preconds: Given the value "tvTrialPaywallDurationString" has been set to "nth days"
custom_steps: When the MLB.TV paywall is launched
custom_expected: Then the Free Trial button on the paywall will reflect the duration of the free trial in "nth Days"

title: News [IAB-4952]: Verify that if we switch to a different Team on News that team specific branding is visible
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item
AND we tap on a random team
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.com menu item will be replaced by that teams icon

title: News [IAB-5014]: Verify that if we don't have a "Favorite Team" set that if we access the "Team Modal" that we will not see a "Favorite Team" header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we don't have a "Favorite Team" set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a "Favorite Team" header does NOT exist

title: News [IAB-5028]: Verify that if tap on the MLB.com menu item that we do not see a "Gear" next to each team name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "News"
AND we tap on the "MLB.com" menu item
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see a "Gear" icon next to each teams name

title: News (Sharing) [IAB-5056]: Verify if the user isn't logged into iMessage and shares a message that it is sent as a Text Message instead
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are currently not signed into iMessages
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the Messages icon
AND we send a message
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that the Message is sent as a Text Message
AND we will notice that the Message isn't sent as an iMessage

title: News (Sharing) [IAB-5058]: Verify that on sub iOS 5 devices that we do not see the messages option on the Sharing Bar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the device that we have is a sub iOS 5 device
AND we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the News menu
AND we navigate to a News Article
AND we bring up the Sharing Menu
custom_expected: THEN we will not see the messaging option as an option to share to

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4810]: Verify if we have a Regular Double Header that the Detail Information shows up correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate to a date that contains a regular "Double Header"
AND we open up the Detail View of each game
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Pitchers are listed correctly
AND we will see that the Tickets button is available
AND we will see that the Promotions button is available

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4810]: Verify that if we have a Back-to-Back Double Header that the Detail Information shows up correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate to a date that contains a "Back-To-Back" double header
AND we open up the Detail View of each game
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Pitchers are listed correctly
AND we will see that the Tickets button is available on the first game
AND we will see that the Tickets button isn't available on the second game
AND we will see that the Promotions button is available

title: Scoreboard [IAB-5025]: Verify that if we background the application and bring it back that the Scoreboard is performing a silent refresh
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scorebaord
AND we background the Application
AND we bring the Application back
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Scoreboard refreshes silently
AND we will see that the Scoreboard will not appear to clear itself before it refreshes itself

title: Scoreboard [IAB-5065]: Verify if we background the application and come back after an hour that the Scoreboard updates appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we background it for an hour
AND we bring the application back up
custom_expected: THEN it will update appropriately

title: Scoreboard [IAB-5085]: Verify that if we tap on the "Promotions" button for a game that has a time of TBD that it will not crash
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate to a game that has a time of TBD
AND we tap on the Game Preview button for that game
AND we tap on the Promotions button for that game
custom_expected:
THEN the Promotions menu will open successfully
AND the application will not crash

title: Settings [IAB-4865]: Verify that if we navigate throughout the Application that at no point do we see any buttons labeled as "Back"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate throughout the Application
custom_expected:
THEN we will not see any buttons labeled as "Back"
AND any buttons that were previously labeled as 'Back" will now just be labeled with the appropriate area that a user would be going back to

title: Settings [IAB-4955]: Verify that we have a "Contact Us" button in the "Help" menu that allows an email to be sent to support
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to More
AND we tap on "Help"
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Contact Us" button exists as long as the configuration file is set correctly

title: Settings [IAB-4958]: Verify that if we receive a "mediaLogs" that when we decrypt it that the readability appears good
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we have attempted to play Audio
OR we have attempted to play MLB.TV
AND we navigate to More
AND we navigate to Help
AND we tap on "Contact Us"
AND we change the "To:" field of the email to our email address
AND we verify that the email has a "mediaLogs.txt" attached to it
AND we send the email
AND we copy the information in the mediaLogs.txt file
AND we paste it into the decoded located at: http://www.motobit.com/util/base64-decoder-encoder.asp
AND we decode the information
custom_expected:
THEN the information will look good in a decrypted state
AND the information will be easily readable

title: Settings [IAB-4964]: You can't delete and/or reorder Favorite Teams though Settings
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to the Teams page through settings
And has selected several favorite teams
And has tapped the Edit button
custom_steps:
When the user to either add/delete teams
Or re-order the teams in any way
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to do so without difficulty
And tapping the Done button will save the settings

title: Settings (Notifications) [IAB-4983]: Verify that if we are in "Gameday" and receive an "In-App" notification that it will display properly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we tap on a game currently in the state of "In Progress"
AND we receive an "In-App Notification"
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "In-App" notification displays correctly

title: Settings (Notifications) [IAB-5051]: Verify if we are playing a Video Highlight and we trigger the Hide Scores banner, that the Notification will NOT display inside of the Video Highlight
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have enabled the "Switch to Toggle" option
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up a Video Highlight
AND we shake the device
custom_expected: THEN the Notification Banner for "Hide Scores" will NOT display

title: Settings [IAB-5067]: Verify that if we open up "Help" that the "Contact Us" button doesn't differ in color from the button on the left side on iOS 5 and greater
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND the "Contact Us" information has been appropriately setup in the Config File
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to More
AND we navigate to Help
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Contact Us" button color matches up with the button on the left's color

title: Team Schedules [IAB-4943]: ASG shows Loss for all teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on an AL or NL Team Schedule
And has changed the month to July
custom_steps: When the result from the All-Star Game is viewed
custom_expected: Then the game cell will display the a W/L for the appropriate league

title: Highlights [IAB-4962]: TeamViewController -> VideoHighlightsViewController then back crashes
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to a team page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on Video Highlights
And then goes taps on the team name button while the highlights are loading
custom_expected:
Then the app will not crash
And will return users to the previous page as expected

title: Teams [IAB-5012]: Verify that if we have a "Favorite Team" set that if we hit the "Audio UI" button in the top right corner while that Team has a "Live Game" going on that it doesn't start up Audio for that particular Team automatically
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a "Favorite Team" set
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on our "Favorite Team" in the Tab Bar
AND our "Favorite Team" is currently playing a "Live Game"
AND we tap on the "Audio UI" controller in the top right corner
custom_expected: THEN the Audio Stream for our "Favorite Team" will NOT automatically start up

title: Teams [IAB-5014]: Verify that if we don't have a "Favorite Team" set that if we access the "Team Modal" that we will not see a "Favorite Team" header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we don't have a "Favorite Team" set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "More"
AND we tap on "Teams"
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see a "Favorite Teams" header

title: Teams [IAB-5028]: Verify that a "Gear" icon appears to the right of each "Team" name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "More"
AND we navigate to "Teams"
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a "Gear" icon appears to the right of each "Team"

title: Teams [IAB-5028]: Verify that a if we have a "Favorite Team" set that the "Gear" icon appears to the right of each "Team" name under the "Teams" MLB.com menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a "Favorite Team" set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Favorite Team" on the Tab Bar
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item in the top left corner
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each "Team" has a "Gear" icon to the right of their name

title: Teams [IAB-5028]: Verify that if a "Favorite Team" is set that the "Teams" menu item is no longer available under "More"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have set a "Favorite Team"
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the "More" Tab Bar item
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Teams" menu item is no longer available

title: Teams [IAB-5028]: Verify that if tap on a "Gear" icon that it will open up the Settings menu for that particular team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we do NOT have a Favorite Team set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "More" tab bar item
AND we tap on the "Teams" menu item
AND we tap on a "Gear" next to a team name
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Settings" for that particular team opens up

title: Teams [IAB-5072]: Verify that we aren't able to select a Teams Page on the Favorite Team "Team Selector"  if the Favorite Team is turned off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat 
AND we have launched the Application 
AND we have no "Favorite Team" set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "More"
AND we navigate to "Teams"
AND we set a Team as our "Favorite Team"
AND we back out of "Teams"
AND we see the Favorite Team icon on the Tab Bar
AND we tap on the Favorite Team icon on the Tab Bar
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item in the top left corner
AND we tap on the gear next to the Favorite Team
AND we turn the Favorite Team off
AND we back out of the Favorite Team
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the entire screen has greyed itself out
AND we will be unable to tap on another team until we set a Favorite Team again

title: Teams [IAB-5098]: Verify if we tap on a Team in the Teams menu that it will open the actual Teams page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we don't have a Favorite Team set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to More
AND we tap on Teams
AND we tap on a Team
custom_expected: THEN that Team's page will successfully open

title: Videos [IAB-4973]: Lite users don't see Highlight Videos
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And has launched it for the the first time
And has been presented with the paywall
custom_steps:
When Go to Lite is tapped
And the user taps on the Videos icon in the tray
custom_expected: Then the Highlight index will display 5 highlight videos

title: Videos [IAB-4974]: Team picker button should default to the MLB.com logo on initial launch
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat has just been installed
And is being launched for the first time
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Videos page in through the icon tray
custom_expected:
Then the filter button in the upper left will not be blank
But will contain the MLB.com label

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-4949]: App Crash Entering Search Text and Scrolling Through Highlight Index
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to the Videos tab
And tapped the Highlights button
custom_steps:
When the user enters a string into the Search field
And waits for the search results to populate the video index
custom_expected: Then scrolling up/down on the index does not cause the app to crash

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-4950]: Video Highlights doesn't remember your scroll position
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to the Videos section in the tab tray
And has tapped on the Highlights button
Or has tapped on the MLB.TV button
custom_steps:
When the user scrolls down to the bottom of either index after it has completed loading
And then taps on another tab in the tray (i.e. Scoreboard, News, etc...)
custom_expected:
Then upon returning to the Videos page, the user will see the scroll position has been honored
And will be exactly where the user left it

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-4951]: Results Do Not Seem to Correlate to Search Criteria Entered
custom_preconds: Given the user has tapped on the Videos button in the icon tray
custom_steps: When a text string is entered into the "Search Highlights" field
custom_expected:
Then the result set will correlate to that which was entered by the user
And will not present random results (in many cases the video title will not have anything to do what was entered by the user but still may be represented during playback. (i.e. If Miguel Cabrera was used as the search criteria but his name is not seen in the title, it may be because he was mentioned during the video playback.)

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-4952]: Verify that if we switch to a different Team on News that team specific branding is visible
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Videos
AND we tap on Highlights
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item
AND we tap on a random team
custom_expected:
THEN the MLB.com menu item will be replaced by that teams icon
AND we will see that the search box states "Search <Insert Random Team Name> Highlights" instead of "Search Highlights"

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-4960]: New Video Highlights do not have a depressed state for each video cell
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to the Videos page through the icon tray
custom_steps: When a highlight video cell is depressed
custom_expected: Then the selected Highlight will darken slightly when tapped by the user

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-4965]: Verify if we attempt to "Tweet" a "Video Highlight" that the Tweet sheet is properly filled with information
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Videos
AND we navigate to Highlights
AND we tap on the Share icon
AND we tap on "Tweet"
custom_expected:
THEN the Tweet sheet will open correctly
AND the Tweet sheet will be appropriately filled

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-4977]: iPhone highlights always fade in
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to the Videos page through the icon tray
custom_steps:
When the user loads Highlights
And either scrolls up or down
custom_expected: All previously loaded Highlights should not fade in when scrolling through the index

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-5014]: Verify that if we don't have a "Favorite Team" set that if we access the "Team Modal" that we will not see a "Favorite Team" header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we do NOT have a "Favorite Team" set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Videos
AND we tap on "Highlights"
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item
custom_expected: THEN we will not see a "Favorite Team" header present

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-5021]: Verify if we tap on the "Share" button on a "Highlight" that it briefly glows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "Videos"
AND we tap on "Highlights"
AND we tap on the "Share" button
custom_expected: THEN the "Share" button will briefly glow

title: Videos (Highlights) [IAB-5028]: Verify that if tap on the MLB.com menu item that no "Gear" icon appears next to each teams name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "Videos"
AND we tap on the "Highlights" tab
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a "Gear" icon does NOT appear next to each Teams Name

title: Accessibility [IAB-4708]: Improve MLB.TV Accessibility Features
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat 
AND we have enabled Accessibility 
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to an MLB.TV Archived game 
AND the user starts up the MLB.TV Archived game
custom_expected:
Then overlays will no longer be available the user
But the FF scrubber will remain onscreen at all times
And the Controller UI will also remain onscreen
And the overlay toggle switch will remain active only in appearance. Tapping it will perform no action

title: Accessibility [IAB-4890]: Pitchers on the Scoreboard that haven't pitched a major league game yet are read weirdly
custom_preconds:
Given the user has enabled Voiceover
And has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: When the user taps on a game tile in which one/both pitchers have a "-.--" ERA
custom_expected: Then Voiceover will read the ERA as "...With no ERA"

title: Accessibility [IAB-4892]: Scoreboard - Tapping on a Game Cell on a game that has finished in extra innings doesn't have it mention the extra innings
custom_preconds:
Given a user has enabled Voiceover
And has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: When a game tile for a game that went into extra innings has been tapped
custom_expected: Then Voiceover will read the tile as "<Road Team> vs. <Home Team>, <Winning team> won <score> in <total innings>..."

title: Accessibility [IAB-4897]: Gameday - Lineup - When tapping on a Team Name under Lineup the Application crashes Immediately
custom_preconds:
Given the user has enabled Voiceover
And has navigated to Gameday
And has changed the date to 06/25/2012
custom_steps:
When we tap on the Mets vs. Cubs game 
AND we tap on the Lineup Tab button to open it up 
AND we tap on the Cubs team name
custom_expected: The app will not crash

title: Accessibility [IAB-4948]: Pause Button Referred to as "MLB.TV iPhone Pause, Button" on iPad When Tapped
custom_preconds: Given Voiceover has been activated
custom_steps:
When the user begins video playback of an Archive game
And taps on the Play/Pause button
custom_expected: Then Voiceover will simply recognize the button as either "Play" or "Pause"

title: Audio [IAB-4837]: UI - Clicking FAQ expands the Audio UI window
custom_preconds: Given we tap on the Audio UI button
custom_steps:
When we tap on Help 
AND we tap on FAQ
custom_expected:
Then the size of the window displaying FAQ content will not resize
But will be scrollable to in order to access additional content at the bottom of the page
And backing out of FAQ will honor the window size

title: Audio [IAB-4975]: Empty log file is being attached when choosing "Contact Us"
custom_preconds:
Given an email account exists on the device
And the user has launched the app
And has accessed the Audio UI
But has not played backed audio/video through any access points in the app
custom_steps:
When the Help button is tapped
And the Contact Us button is tapped
custom_expected:
Then an email will be created containing device info will be created 
But will not contain an attached log file

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5027]: Verify that the Disconnect Button is always below the "Sync powered by Microsoft" logo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Ford Sync screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Disconnect" button will always appear below the "Sync powered by Microsoft" logo

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5040]: Verify that the Head Unit's display will update appropriately every 2 minutes to display the latest Game Progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
AND there are games in progress
custom_steps: WHEN we have a game up on the Head Unit's display
custom_expected: THEN it will successfully update a games progress every 2 minutes

AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to issue the command of "Next Feed"
OR we attempt the "Previous Feed" command
custom_expected: THEN it will work on a consistent basis

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5042]: Verify that when a game is in progress that it will be announced as: Team A vs. Team B <Inning Information>, Team A lead xx-yy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps:
WHEN we issue a Team Command
AND there is a game in progress for that particular team
custom_expected: THEN we will notice that the game is announced correctly as: Team A vs. Team B <Inning Information>, Team A lead xx-yy

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps: WHEN we issue a command to switch Audio Feeds
custom_expected: THEN the Head Unit display will update appropriately to reflect the new Audio Feed

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5047]: Verify that if we open up the MLB.TV Grid or Audio UI that these overlays will not be on top of the "Ford Sync" splash screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we open up the Audio UI overlay
OR we open up the MLB.TV overlay
AND we connect to Ford Sync
custom_expected:
THEN the Audio UI overlay will not appear over the Ford Sync splash screen
AND the MLB.TV overlay will not appear over the Ford Sync splash screen

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5048]: Verify that the Losing Team is never listed as the Winning Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps: WHEN we use the Team Command to bring up the score from a game gone final
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Winning Team is announced correctly
AND we will see that the Losing Team is announced correctly

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5095]: Verify that a game in a "Final" state reads as "Final" and not "Game Over"
Ford Sync [IAB-5095]: Verify that the screen text displays as "Team vs. Team" and not "Team vs. Team,"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps: WHEN we issue a Team Command
custom_expected:
THEN the display will display as "Team vs. Team"
AND the display will not display as "Team vs. Team,"

title: Ford Sync [IAB-5097]: Verify that when a feed has ended that it reads as "Final - Feed Ended" instead of "Final - Unknown Error"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have connected to Ford Sync
custom_steps:
WHEN we issue a Team Command
AND the game for the Team in question has entered a Final state where the feed is no longer available
custom_expected: THEN we will see that it will read as "Final - Feed Ended"

title: Gameday [IAB-4731]: Verify that the Date Picker will show 6 weeks of information appropriately if necessary

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we see that the Date Picker is on the month that we have set our device date to
AND we navigate to any other month in the year
AND we tap on "Today"
AND we tap on the "Date Picker" again
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Date Picker" shows every week of that month appropriately

title: Gameday [IAB-4867]: Lineup Overlay for Interleague Games in which the NL Team is Home Must Only Display Positions 1-9
custom_preconds: Given there is an interleague game in which the NL team is the home team
custom_steps: When accessing the Lineup overlay in Gameday
custom_expected:
Then only positions 1-9 will be visible on both teams Lineup overlays
And will not show the P position at the bottom of the overlay

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:

title: Gameday [IAB-5064]: Verify that the Date Picker will be able to select the first day of the month successfully

AND we have launched the Application

AND we tap on the Date Picker
AND we tap on any day other then the first of the month

AND we tap on the first day of the month

custom_expected: THEN we will see that the first of the month is "Highlighted" appropriately

title: Hide Scores [IAB-4989]: Verify that if we toggle the "Hide Scores" banner on/off that when it displays there is an "x" that allows us to close the banner

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:

OR we disable "Hide Scores"
AND we see the banner appear
custom_expected: THEN the banner will have an "x" that allows us to close it

title: Hide Scores [IAB-4999]: Verify that if "Hide Scores" is enabled that a game in progress does not display "TBD" for Pitcher Matchups
custom_preconds:

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we enable "Hide Scores"
AND we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND there are games in the state of "In Progress" available
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Pitching Matchup will now display as blank

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5013]: Verify that we can see the "Innings" label still if "Hide Scores" is enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have enabled "Hide Scores"
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate around the application
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Innings" label is still present

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5035]: Verify that if "Hide Scores" is enabled that if we tap on the "MLB.com" menu item that Gameday / Scoreboard show a "Hide Scores" icon to the right of their menu items
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we enable "Hide Scores"
AND we tap on the MLB.com menu item
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a "Hide Scores" icon exists to the right of the Gameday / Scoreboard menu items

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5045]: Verify that if "Hide Scores" is enabled that if we have a "Detail" view open that we can't access the buttons that would be hidden behind the "Detail" view by simply clicking the area that they reside at normally
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat 
AND we have launched the Application 
AND we have "Hide Scores" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND there is a game in the state of "In Progress" 
AND we tap on a random location on the "Hide Scores" view where something would normally be there without it
custom_expected: THEN we will not be able to accidentally tap the "MLB.TV", "Audio" and/or "Gameday" buttons

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5053]: Verify that if we "Shake to Toggle" that if a previous "Hide Scores" banner was visible that it dismisses itself before the new banner comes in and doesn't blink out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have "Shake to Toggle" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we "Shake to Toggle"
AND we see the banner appear
AND we "Shake to Toggle"
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the old banner animate out
AND we will see the new banner animate in
AND we will not see the old banner just simply blink out

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5055]: Verify if we enable "Hide Scores" one one day and turn it off on a future day that the future day works appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have "Shake to Toggle" turned on
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we "Shake to Toggle"
AND we verify that the "Detail View" shows the "Hide Scores" detail view on a Game Tile
AND we move to a future date on the Scoreboard
AND we "Shake to Toggle"
AND we open up a Game Tile
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the "Detail View" shows the normal "Preview Screen"
AND we will not see the "Hide Scores" detail view

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5071]: Verify if we enable "Hide Scores" on day with "No Games Scheduled" that we will not see the "Hide Scores" detail view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat 
AND we have launched the Application 
AND we have enabled the "Shake to Toggle" option
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday 
AND we navigate to a day with a game (i.e. 07/11/2012) 
AND we shake to enable the "Hide Scores" 
AND we shake to disable the "Hide Scores" 
AND we navigate to a day with no games (i.e. 07/12/2012) 
AND we shake to enable the "Hide Scores" 
AND we shake to disable the "Hide Scores"
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the "Hide Scores" is turned off 
AND we will see that we can no longer see the "Hide Scores" detail view

title: Hide Scores [IAB-5077]: Verify that if "Hide Scores" is enabled that Delayed States are displayed correctly
custom_preconds:

AND we have launched the Application
AND we have "Hide Scores" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate to the Gameday Out-of-Town Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN we will see that in both places that the delayed states are appropriately displayed

title: Paywall [IAB-4752]: Getting logging out feature notice after continuing to lite after upgrade and accessing feature

custom_steps:
When user updates the app
And opens the app
And continues to Lite
And accesses an MLB.TV feed
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted by the paywall to log in
And will not receive any messages related to logging out and losing paid features

custom_preconds: Given the value "tvTrialPaywallDurationString" has been set to "nth days"
custom_steps: When the paywall is launched
custom_expected: Then the Free Trial button on the paywall will reflect the duration of the free trial in "nth Days"

title: Paywall [IAB-4914]: iPhone MLB.TV PayWall image is inaccurate, it's showing the old TV overlays
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been recently installed

custom_steps: When the Paywall appears on screen
custom_expected: Then user will see containing current overlays

title: MLB.com Menu [IAB-4933]: iPad Menu crash when pushing on an external website

custom_steps:
When the link is tapped
And the user is prompted by "Do you want to go to Safari"
And the user taps the Ok button
custom_expected: Then the app will not crash

title: MLB.TV (Data Syncing) [IAB-5005]: Tapping on pitches in the PitchFX window only displays details for one pitch at a time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have Data Syncing enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to MLB.TV
AND we select a TV Feed that has Data Syncing enabled
AND the pitcher has thrown a few pitches in the current At Bat
AND we tap on Pitch #1
AND we tap on Pitch #2
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that Pitch #1 closes
AND we will see that Pitch #2 displays correctly

title: MLB.TV (Data Syncing) [IAB-5008]: Verify that on the Plays overlay that Outs and Scoring are not overlapping if they occur in the same play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application 
AND we have "Data Syncing" enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the MLB.TV menu 
AND we start up a Stream / Archive Feed that has Data Syncing enabled on it
AND we hit the "Plays-by-Plays" menu item
AND we look down for a play where an OUT was recorded at the same time a RUN scored
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Score Text" overlaps the "Out Text"

title: MLB.TV (Data Syncing) [IAB-5084]: Verify that if we have a batter with a long name that goes over the "|" divider that the "|" divider is in the background
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat 
AND we have launched the Application 
AND we have Data Syncing enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to MLB.TV 
AND we start up a feed with Data Syncing enabled
AND we have a runner on 1st base with a long name
custom_expected:
THEN we will notice that his name will not be cut by the line divider
AND we will notice that the line divider is in the background
AND we will notice that the name still overlays on top of the line divider

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4920]: Verify that the national blackout text reads correctly at the moment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the MLB.TV menu item
AND we start up a MLB.TV Stream that has a "National Blackout" against it
custom_expected:
THEN the "National Blackout" text will read as:

Due to MLB exclusivities, live national broadcasts of MLB events, such as the All-Star Game, and live national broadcasts of MLB games occurring each Saturday with a scheduled start time after 1:10 PM ET or before 8:00 PM ET and each Sunday with a scheduled start time after 5:00 PM ET will be blacked out in the U.S. (including Guam and the U.S. Virgin Islands). In the event of circumstances that produce a programming conflict or change in schedule, the above blackout windows may be subject to change. Live audio broadcast as well as on-demand viewing following the conclusion of the game or event may be available as part of an MLB.TV or At Bat 12 subscription.

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4926]: Verify that when we start up an MLB.TV Archive Feed that the Scrubber works correctly
custom_preconds:

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to MLB.TV
AND we select an Archived Game
AND we start up one of the Archived Game Feeds
AND we attempt to pull the scrubber around
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to utilize the scrubber successfully.

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4934]: Verify that if we are on a day with "No Video's Available" that we do not see the MLB.TV upsell link

AND we are utilizing the Lite version of the Application

title: MLB.TV [IAB-5015]: Verify that if we disable Hide Scores while inside MLB.TV that the Box Score restores correctly

title: Settings [IAB-4958]: Verify that if we receive a "mediaLogs" that when we decrypt it that the readability appears good
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we have attempted to play Audio
OR we have attempted to play MLB.TV
AND we navigate to Settings
AND we navigate to Help
AND we tap on "Contact Us"
AND we change the "To:" field of the email to our email address
AND we verify that the email has a "mediaLogs.txt" attached to it
AND we send the email
AND we copy the information in the mediaLogs.txt file
AND we paste it into the decoded located at: http://www.motobit.com/util/base64-decoder-encoder.asp
AND we decode the information
custom_expected:
THEN the information will look good in a decrypted state
AND the information will be easily readable

title: Settings [IAB-5067]: Verify that if we open up "Help" that the "Contact Us" button doesn't differ in color from the button on the left side on iOS 5 and greater
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND the "Contact Us" information has been appropriately setup in the Config File
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Settings
AND we navigate to Help
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the "Contact Us" button color matches up with the button on the left's color

title: Schedules [IAB-4842]: Ability to get a Preview screen to appear that belongs to another game
custom_preconds: Given we navigate to Team Schedules
custom_steps:
When we tap on a Team 
AND we select a Game Cell that is in the state of Preview 
AND we tap on the "vs." button to load it up (cache the webview) 
AND we tap off to close the Preview screen 
AND we switch the device to Airplane Mode 
AND we bring Team Schedules back up 
AND we tap on a different game that is in the preview state 
AND we tap on the "vs." button 
AND we notice that the MLB.com logo displays 
AND we take the device out of Airplane Mode 
AND we bring the Application back up
custom_expected: THEN when returning to app the, the Detail view will be completely dismissed

title: Schedules [IAB-4943]: ASG shows Loss for all teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on an AL or NL Team Schedule
And has changed the month to July
custom_steps: When the result from the All-Star Game is viewed
custom_expected: Then the game cell will display the a W/L for the appropriate league
